channel.title: 508 client problems
channel.description:
i own a 508 server the client i use is a 508 HD FULLSCREEN CLIENT its been working for me lately with tittana cache install my c drive but when i type my ip it says on the party "loading 3d libary" and i check on the cmd box and look what it says
error_game_caps_vesa
so what does that mean do i fix anything and what do i have to do?? thanks :)
